name: Blast 3D
description:
Do you like 3D? Do you like blasting things? Play Blast 3D!

Guide your snake with a finger swipe and blast hundreds of balls to break the 3D bricks. Watch the bricks fall while blasting at them!
Collect additional balls to enhance your shooting prowess.

Blast everything! Destroy every brick!

It is simply delightful to shoot at bricks and watch them fall!

Game Features:
- A 3D game for more sensation & fun
- An infinite number of levels
- Each level is unique
- Endless fun
- Intuitive swipe control
- Thrilling power-ups
